replies.msg:
Distribution List: All staff and contractors
RE: Contingency Arrangement for Transport to and from HKIA on 12 August evening
Personnel please be advised that:
1. All franchised bus services to Airport will not call at T1.
2. All franchises bus services (including “A” routes and “E” routes) depart from Airport will be suspended from 1800H.
3. Airport Express services will be suspended from 1800H.
4. The taxi queues will be dismissed at 18:00H.
